pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: University of North Texas Music Library
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Reel-to-reel and cassette tapes, with performances by numerous Swing-Era bands including Artie Shaw, Count Basie, and many others. The principal focus of the collection, however, is Benny Goodman, with live performances, airchecks, and electrical transcriptions.
pageContext._xxxcollectionUsageStatementxtxt: Reproduction and publication of materials in this collection are subject to the policies of the UNT Music Library. Copyright restrictions may apply.
